Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:3: И се уповавай на Аллах! Достатъчен е Аллах за покровител.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:4: Аллах не е сторил две сърца в гърдите на един човек.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:5: Назовавайте ги на бащите им! То е най-справедливо при Аллах.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:6: Пророка е по-близък за вярващите от самите тях, и съпругите му за тях са като майки.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:7: И приехме Ние от пророците обета им, и от теб, и от Нух, и Ибрахим, и Муса, и Иса, сина на Мариам.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:8: за да пита Той правдивите за тяхната правдивост.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:9: О, вярващи, помнете благодатта на Аллах към вас, когато насреща ви настъпиха с войски, а Ние пратихме срещу им вятър и войски, които не видяхте.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:10: Когато настъпиха и отгоре, и отдолу срещу вас, и когато погледите се вцепениха и сърцата заседнаха в гърлото, и допуснахте за Аллах различни догадки,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:11: там вярващите бяха изпитани и разтърсени от силно сътресение.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:12: И лицемерите, и онези, в чиито сърца имаше болест, рекоха: Аллах и Неговият Пратеник ни обещаха само измама.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:13: И група от тях рече: О, жители на Ясриб,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:14: няма място за вас, върнете се! И част от тях помоли Пратеника за разрешение [да се върнат] казвайки: Незащитени са ни домовете.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:15: И ако се нахлуе срещу тях от краищата [на града], и после бъдат подтикнати към бунт, несъмнено ще го направят.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:16: И преди бяха дали обет на Аллах, че не ще обърнат гръб.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:17: Кажи: Не ще ви е от полза богатството, ако бягате от смъртта или убийството.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:18: Кажи: Кой ще ви предпази от Аллах, ако Той пожелае вреда за вас или пожелае милост за вас? И освен Аллах не ще намерят за себе си нито покровител, нито избавител.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:19: Аллах знае кои препятстват сред вас и кои казват на своите братя: Хайде при нас! Те встъпват в битката само за кратко -
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:21: Смятат, че съюзените племена не са си отишли, а ако съюзените племена дойдат, биха пожелали да са в пустинята сред бедуините и да питат за вести от вас.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:22: Пратеника на Аллах е прекрасен образец за вас - за всеки, който се надява на Аллах и на Сетния ден, и често споменава Аллах.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:23: И когато вярващите видяха племената, рекоха: Това е, което ни обещава Аллах, и Неговият Пратеник.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:24: Сред вярващите има мъже, предани в своя обет към Аллах.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:25: за да награди Аллах преданите за предаността им и да накаже лицемерите, ако пожелае, или да им приеме покаянието.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:26: Аллах върна неверниците с тяхната ярост.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:27: Онези от хората на Писанието, които подкрепяха ,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:28: Той ги смъкна от техните крепости и хвърли в сърцата им ужаса.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:29: Той ви остави в наследство земята им, домовете, имотите и земя, на която още не сте стъпили.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:30: О, Пророче, кажи на своите съпруги: Ако сте пожелали земния живот и неговата украса, елате да ви дам [задължителната плата] и да ви освободя с добро!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:31: А ако сте пожелали Аллах и Неговия Пратеник, и Сетния дом, то Аллах е приготвил за благодетелните сред вас огромна награда.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:32: О, жени на Пророка, която от вас извърши явно безсрамие, мъчението й ще бъде удвоено.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:33: А която от вас се покори на Аллах и на Неговия Пратеник, и върши праведни дела, ще й въздадем двойна отплата.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:34: О, жени на Пророка, вие не сте като никоя друга от жените.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:35: И стойте в домовете си, и не се показвайте, както се показваха жените по времето на Невежеството, и отслужвайте молитвата, и давайте милостинята закат, и се покорявайте на Аллах и на Неговия Пратеник! Аллах иска да отмахне от вас всяка нечистота, о, хора от дома [на Пророка], и напълно да ви пречисти.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:36: И помнете онова от знаменията на Аллах и от мъдростта, което бива четено в домовете ви! Аллах е всепроникващ, сведущ.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:37: За мюсюлманите и мюсюлманките, вярващите мъже и вярващите жени, набожните мъже и набожните жени, искрените мъже и искрените жени, търпеливите мъже и търпеливите жени, смирените мъже и смирените жени, мъжете, раздаващи милостиня, и жените, раздаващи милостиня, говеещите мъже и говеещите жени, и целомъдрените мъже и целомъдрените жени, и мъжете, често споменаващи Аллах, и споменаващите жени - Аллах е приготвил за тях опрощение и огромна награда.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:38: И когато Аллах, и Неговият Пратеник, отсъди някакво дело, нито вярващ, нито вярваща имат право на избор в това дело.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:39: И ето, казваш на онзи, когото Аллах облагодетелства, и когото ти облагодетелства: Задръж съпругата си при теб и бой се от Аллах! И спотаи ти в душата си онова, което Аллах разкри, и се притесни от хората, а Аллах повече заслужава да се боиш от Него.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:40: Няма за Пророка притеснение за онова, което Аллах му е наложил.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:41: - повелята на Аллах е предопределена съдба -
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:42: онези, които оповестяваха посланията на Аллах и се бояха от Него, и не се бояха от никого освен от Аллах.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:43: Мухаммад не е баща на никого от вашите мъже, а е Пратеника на Аллах и последният от пророците.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:45: И Го прославяйте сутрин и вечер!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:46: Той е, Който ви благославя, и Неговите ангели, за да ви изведе от тъмнините към светлината.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:47: Поздравът им в Деня, когато ще Го срещнат, е: Мир! За тях Той е приготвил щедра награда.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:48: О, Пророче, Ние те изпратихме като свидетел, благовестител и предупредител,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:49: и зовящ към Аллах с Неговото позволение, и като озаряващ светилник.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:50: Възрадвай вярващите, че за тях ще има голяма благодат от Аллах!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:51: И не следвай неверниците и лицемерите, и отмини обидите им, и се уповавай на Аллах! Достатъчен е Аллах за покровител.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:52: О, вярващи, ако се жените за вярващи жени, после им дадете развод, преди да сте ги докоснали, нямате към тях срок за изчакване.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:53: О, Пророче, разрешихме ти за съпруги онези, на които си дал задължителната плата, и владените от твоята десница сред пленничките, които Аллах ти е дарил, и дъщерите на чичовците ти, и дъщерите на лелите ти, и дъщерите на вуйчовците ти, и дъщерите на вуйните ти, които се преселиха с теб.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:54: Ти можеш да отсрочиш която от тях пожелаеш и да приютиш при себе си която пожелаеш.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:55: И не са ти разрешени отпосле други жени освен тези, нито да ги подменяш със съпруги, дори да те е възхитила тяхната красота, освен владените от десницата ти.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:56: О, вярващи, не влизайте в домовете на Пророка, за да ядете, освен ако ви бъде позволено, но без да изчаквате сготвянето му.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:58: И да показвате нещо или да го скривате - Аллах всяко нещо знае.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:59: Няма грях за жените [да се показват без покривало] пред бащите им, синовете им, братята им, синовете на братята им, синовете на сестрите им, пред жените
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:60: и пред владените от техните десници.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:61: Аллах и Неговите ангели благославят Пророка.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:62: Които огорчават Аллах и Неговия Пратеник, Аллах ги проклина в земния живот и в отвъдния, и е приготвил за тях унизително мъчение.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:63: А които незаслужено огорчават вярващите мъже и жени, те се нагърбват с клевета и явен грях.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:64: О, Пророче, кажи на съпругите си и на дъщерите си, и на жените на вярващите, да спускат върху себе си покривалото [когато излизат].
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:65: Ако лицемерите и онези, в чиито сърца има болест, и разпространителите на слухове в Медина не престанат, ще те подбудим срещу тях, после там само за кратко ще съжителстват с теб -
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:67: Такъв бе обичаят на Аллах и спрямо отминалите преди, и не ще откриеш ти промяна в обичая на Аллах.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:69: Аллах прокле неверниците и приготви за тях Пламъци.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:70: Там ще пребивават вечно и не ще намерят нито покровител, нито избавител.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:71: В Деня, когато лицата им бъдат преобръщани в Огъня, ще рекат: О, да се бяхме покорили на Аллах и да се бяхме покорили на Пратеника!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:72: И ще рекат: Господи наш, покорявахме се на своите управници и големци, а те ни отклониха от пътя.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:73: Господи наш, въздай им двойно от мъчението и ги прокълни с голямо проклятие!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:74: О, вярващи, не бъдете като онези, които огорчаваха Муса! Но Аллах го оневини за онова, което говореха и бе почитан при Аллах.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:75: О, вярващи, бойте се от Аллах и изричайте правдиви слова!
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:76: Тогава Той ще поправи делата ви и ще опрости греховете ви.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:77: Ние предложихме на небесата и на земята, и на планините отговорността, но те се възпротивиха да я носят и се уплашиха от нея.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 33:78: за да накаже Аллах лицемерните мъже и жени, и съдружаващите мъже и жени, и да приеме Аллах покаянието на вярващите мъже и жени.

null.verse 33:1: 先知啊！你應當敬畏真主，你不要順從不信者和偽信者，真主確是全知的，確是至睿的。
null.verse 33:2: 你應當遵循從你的主降示你的（經典），真主確是徹知你們的行為的。
null.verse 33:3: 你應當信托真主，真主足為監護者。
null.verse 33:4: 真主沒有在任何人的胸膛裡創造兩個心。你們的妻子，你們把她們的脊背當做自己的母親的脊背——真主沒有把她們當做你們的母親，也沒有把你們的義子當作你們的兒子。這是你們信口開河的話。真主是說明真理的，是指示正道的。
null.verse 33:5: 你們應當以他們的父親的姓氏稱呼他們，在真主看來，這是更公平的。如果你們不知道他們的父親是誰，那末，他們是你們的教胞和親友。你們所誤犯的事，對於你們沒有罪過，你們所故犯的事，就不然了。真主是至赦的，是至慈的。
null.verse 33:6: 先知對信士們的權利，重於他們自身的權利，他的眾妻，是他們的母親。血親與血親相互間的權利，依真主的經典，是重於信士和遷士的權利的，除非你們對自己的親友行善。這是記錄在天經裡的。
null.verse 33:7: 當日，我與眾先知訂約，與你和努哈、易卜拉欣、穆薩、麥爾彥之子爾撒訂約，我與他們訂莊嚴的盟約，
null.verse 33:8: 以便真主向誠實者詢問他們的誠實。他已為不信道者預備了痛苦的刑罰。
null.verse 33:9: 信道的人們啊！你們應當記憶真主所賜你們的恩典。當時，敵軍來攻你們，我就對他們派遣暴風和你們所未見的天兵。真主是明察你們的行為的。
null.verse 33:10: 當時，他們從你們的上面扣你們的下面來攻你們；當時，你們眼花心跳，並對真主作種種猜測。
null.verse 33:11: 在那時，信士們曾受到考驗，並受劇烈的震動。
null.verse 33:12: 當時，偽信者和心中有病的人都說：「真主及其使者，只虛偽地應許我們。」
null.verse 33:13: 當時，他們中的一派人說：「葉斯里卜人啊，你們不必在這裡逗留了。你們回家去吧！」他們中的一派人，向先知告假說：「我們的房屋，確是破爛的。」其實他們的房屋並不是破爛的，他們要想逃走。
null.verse 33:14: 假若這座城被敵人四面攻破，而後敵軍要求他們叛教，他們必定承諾。他們因為此事只耽延片刻。
null.verse 33:15: 以前他們與真主確已約定，他們絕不轉背。真主的盟約，是應該負責履行的。
null.verse 33:16: 你說：「如果你們逃避死亡，或殺戮，那末，逃避對於你們絕無裨益。你們即使逃避，也只得到稍稍享受。」
null.verse 33:17: 你說：「如果真主欲降禍於你們，誰能反抗真主而保護你們呢？如果他欲降福於你們，（誰能干涉他）呢？」除真主外，他們不能發現任何監護者和任何援助者。
null.verse 33:18: 真主知道你們中有些人阻礙別人，並且對他們的同胞說：「你們到我們這邊來吧！」他們只偶爾參戰。
null.verse 33:19: 他們對你們是吝嗇的。當恐怖降臨的時候，你見他們望著你，他們的眼睛轉動得像昏死的人一樣；當恐怖消失的時候，他們卻以尖利的口舌痛罵你們，而他們對錢財是吝嗇的。這等人，沒有信道，故真主揭示他們的行為的虛偽，這對於真主是容易的。
null.verse 33:20: 他們以為同盟軍還沒有撤退，如果同盟軍卷土重來，他們將希望自己在沙漠中的游牧的阿拉伯人中間，並從那裡探聽你們的消息，假若他們與你們相處，他們只偶爾參加戰鬥。
null.verse 33:21: 希望真主和末日，並且多多記念真主者，你們有使者可以作為他們的優良模範。
null.verse 33:22: 當信士見同盟軍的時候，他們說：「這是真主及其使者所應許我們的，真主及其使者說對了。」這件事只能使他們更加確信，更加順從。
null.verse 33:23: 信士中有許多人，已實踐他們與真主所訂的盟約：他們中有成仁的，有待義的，他們沒有變節。
null.verse 33:24: 以便真主因誠實者的誠實而善報他們，並且隨意地懲罰偽信者，或赦宥他們。真主確是至赦的，確是至慈的。
null.verse 33:25: 真主使不信道者末能獲勝，忿忿而歸；真主使信士不戰而勝。真主是至剛的，是萬能的。
null.verse 33:26: 他曾使幫助他們的那些信奉天經者，從自己的堡壘上下來，並且把恐怖投在他們心裡，你們殺戮一部分，俘虜一部分。
null.verse 33:27: 他使你們繼承他們的土地、房屋、財產和你們尚未踏過的土地。真主對於萬事是全能的。
null.verse 33:28: 先知啊！你對你的眾妻說：「如果你們欲得今世的生活與其裝飾，那末，你們來吧！我將以離儀饋贈你們，我任你們依禮而離去。
null.verse 33:29: 如果你們欲得真主及其使者的喜悅，與後世的安宅，那末，真主確已為你們中的行善者，預備了重大的報酬。」
null.verse 33:30: 先知的妻子們啊！你們中誰作了明顯的醜事者，將受加倍的刑罰，這事對於真主是容易的。
null.verse 33:31: 你們中誰服從真主及其使者，而且行善，我將加倍報酬誰，我已為她預備了優厚的給養。
null.verse 33:32: 先知的妻子們啊！你們不像別的任何婦女，如果你們敬畏真主，就不要說溫柔的話，以免心中有病的人，貪戀你們；你們應當說莊重的話。
null.verse 33:33: 你們應當安居於你們的家中，你們不要炫露你們的美麗，如從前蒙昧時代的婦女那樣。你們應當謹守拜功，完納天課，順從真主及其使者。先知的家屬啊！真主只欲消除你們的污穢，洗淨你們的罪惡。
null.verse 33:34: 你們應當謹記在你們家中所宣讀的真主的蹟象和格言，真主是玄妙的，是徹知的。
null.verse 33:35: 順服的男女、信道的男女、服從的男女、誠實的男女、堅忍的男女、恭敬的男女、好施的男女、齋戒的男女、保守貞操的男女、常念真主的男女，真主已為他們預備了赦宥和重大的報酬。
null.verse 33:36: 當真主及其使者判決一件事的時候，信道的男女對於他們的事，不宜有選擇。誰違抗真主及其使者，誰已陷入顯著的迷誤了。
null.verse 33:37: 當時，你對那真主曾施以恩惠，你也曾施以恩惠的人說：「你應當挽留你的妻子，你應當敬畏真主。」你把真主所欲昭示的，隱藏在你的心中，真主是更應當為你所畏懼的，你卻畏懼眾人。當宰德離絕她的時候，我以她為你的妻子，以免信士們為他們的義子所離絕的妻子而感覺煩難。真主的命令，是必須奉行的。
null.verse 33:38: 先知對於真主所許他的事，不宜感覺煩難。真主曾以此為古人的常道。真主的命令是不可變更的定案。
null.verse 33:39: 先知們是傳達真主的使命的，他們畏懼他，除真主外，他們不畏懼任何人。真主足為監察者。
null.verse 33:40: 穆罕默德不是你們中任何男人的父親，而是真主的使者，和眾先知的封印。真主是全知萬物的。
null.verse 33:41: 信道的人們啊！你們應當常常記念真主，
null.verse 33:42: 你們應當朝夕讚頌他超絕萬物。
null.verse 33:43: 他憐憫你們，他的天神們為你們祈禱，以便他將你們從重重黑暗引入光明，他是憐憫信士的。
null.verse 33:44: 他們與真主會見的那天，真主對他們的祝辭是：「祝你們平安。」他已為他們預備了優厚的報酬。
null.verse 33:45: 先知啊！我確已派遣你為見証者，為報喜者，為警告者，
null.verse 33:46: 為奉真主之命而召人於真主者，為燦爛的明燈。
null.verse 33:47: 你應當向信士們報喜，他們將獲得真主降下的宏恩。
null.verse 33:48: 你不要順從不信者和偽信者，你應當任隨他們辱罵，你應當信任真主，真主足為監護者。
null.verse 33:49: 信道的人們啊！你們若娶信道的婦女，然後在交接前休了她們，那末，她們不該為你們而守限期，所以你們應當使她們享受，應當讓她們依禮而離去。
null.verse 33:50: 先知啊！我確已准你享受你給予聘禮的妻子，你的奴婢，即真主以為你的戰利品的，你的從父的女兒、你的姑母的女兒、你的舅父的女兒、你的姨母的女兒，她們是同你一道遷居的。信道的婦女，若將自身贈與先知，若先知願意娶她，這是特許你的，信士們不得援例——我知道我為他們的妻子與奴婢而對他們做出的規定——以免你感受困難。真主是至赦的，是至慈的。
null.verse 33:51: 你可以任意地離絕她們中的任何人，也可以任意地挽留她們中的任何人。你所暫離的妻子，你想召回她，對於你是毫無罪過的。那是最近於使她們感到安慰而無悲哀的，並且都滿意你所給予她們的。真主知道你們的心事，真主是全知的，是至睿的。
null.verse 33:52: 以後不准你再娶婦女，也不准你以她們換掉別的妻子，即使你羡慕她們的美貌，除非是你的奴婢。真主是監視萬物的。
null.verse 33:53: 信道的人們啊！你們不要進先知的家，除非邀請你們去吃飯的時候；你們不要進去等飯熟，當請你們去的時候才進去；既吃之後就當告退，不要留戀閑話，因為那會使先知感到為難，他不好意思辭退你們。真主是不恥於揭示真理的。你們向先知的妻子們索取任何物品的時候，應當在帷幕外索取，那對於你們的心和她們的心是更清白的。你們不宜使真主的使者為難，在他之後，永不宜娶他的妻子，因為在真主看來，那是一件大罪。
null.verse 33:54: 如果你們要表白甚麼，或隱匿甚麼，（真主總是知道的），因為真主確是全知萬物的。
null.verse 33:55: 她們無妨會見她們的父親、兒子、弟兄、侄子、外甥、信道的婦女，和自己的奴婢。你們應當敬畏真主，真主確是見証萬物的。
null.verse 33:56: 真主的確憐憫先知，他的天神們的確為他祝福。信士們啊！你們應當為他祝福，應當祝他平安！
null.verse 33:57: 誹謗真主和使者的人，真主在今世和後世必棄絕他們，並為他們預備凌辱的刑罰。
null.verse 33:58: 以信士們和信女們所未犯的罪惡誹謗他們者，確已擔負誣蔑和明顯的罪惡。
null.verse 33:59: 先知啊！你應當對你的妻子、你的女兒和信士們的婦女說：她們應當用外衣蒙著自己的身體。這樣做最容易使人認識她們，而不受侵犯。真主是至赦的，是至慈的。
null.verse 33:60: 偽信的、心中有病的、在城中煽惑人心的，如果他們仍不罷休，我必命你制裁他們，他們就不得久居城中與你為鄰了。
null.verse 33:61: 他們將被棄絕，無論他們在哪裡被發現，就在哪裡被逮捕，而被處死。
null.verse 33:62: 這是真主對於古人的常道，你絕不能發現任何變更。
null.verse 33:63: 眾人問你復活時在甚麼時候？你說：「那只有真主才知道。」甚麼使你知道它何時發生呢？復活時，或許是很近的。
null.verse 33:64: 真主確已棄絕不信道者，並為他們預備烈火。
null.verse 33:65: 他們將永居其中，不能得到任何保護者，也不能得到任何援助者。
null.verse 33:66: 他們的面皮在火中被翻轉之日，他們將說：「但願我們曾服從真主，服從使者！」
null.verse 33:67: 他們說：「我們的主啊！我們確已服從我們的領袖和我們的偉人，是他們使我們違背正道。
null.verse 33:68: 我們的主啊！求你用加倍的刑罰處治他們，求你嚴厲地棄絕他們。」
null.verse 33:69: 信道的人們啊！你們不要仿效冤誣穆薩的人們。真主已為他洗雪冤誣，據真主看來，他是有面子的。
null.verse 33:70: 信士們啊！你們應當敬畏真主，應當說正話。
null.verse 33:71: 他就改善你們的行為，就赦宥你們的罪過。服從真主及其使者的人，確已獲得偉大的成功。
null.verse 33:72: 我確已將重任信托大地和山岳，但它們不肯承擔它，它們畏懼它，而人卻承擔了——人確是不義的，確是無知的，
null.verse 33:73: 以致真主懲罰偽信的男女和以物配主的男女，而赦宥信道的男女！真主是至赦的，是至慈的。 我確已將重任信托大地和山岳，但它們不肯承擔它，它們畏懼它，而人卻承擔了——人確是不義的，確是無知的，

null.verse 33:1: Proroku, boj se Boha a neposlouchej nevěřící a pokrytce, vždyť Bůh je věru všemohoucí i moudrý!
null.verse 33:2: Následuj to, co ti bylo vnuknuto od Pána tvého! A Bůh vskutku je dobře zpraven o všem, co děláte.
null.verse 33:3: Spolehni se na Boha, neboť Bůh zajisté stačí jako ochránce.
null.verse 33:4: Nazývejte adoptivní děti své podle otců jejich, neboť to spravedlivější je před Bohem.
null.verse 33:5: Prorok je bližší věřícím než oni sobě navzájem a jeho manželky jsou matkami jejich.
null.verse 33:6: příbuzní jsou si vzájemně bližší, podle Písma Božího, než (medínští) věřící a vystěhovalci; přesto čiňte přátelům svým to, co je uznáno za vhodné.
null.verse 33:7: A hle, uzavřeli jsme s proroky úmluvu, s tebou, s Noem, s Abrahamem, s Mojžíšem i s Ježíšem synem Mariiným, a uzavřeli jsme s nimi úmluvu přísnou
null.verse 33:8: a Bůh požádá spravedlivé o počet z pravdomluvnosti jejich, zatímco pro nevěřící připravil trest bolestný.
null.verse 33:9: Vy, kteří věříte! Pomněte dobrodiní Božího vůči vám, když vojska táhla proti vám a poslali jsme proti nim vichřici a vojska neviditelná.
null.verse 33:10: když proti vám táhli zdola i shora, když zraky vaše se strachem zakalily a srdce vám stoupala do hrdel a když jste měli o Bohu domněnky různé.
null.verse 33:11: A byli tam tehdy věřící podrobeni zkoušce a byli otřeseni silným otřesem.
null.verse 33:12: A hle, pokrytci a ti, v jejichž srdcích nemoc dlí, zvolali: "Vše, co nám přislíbil Bůh a posel Jeho, není nic než klam!"
null.verse 33:13: A hle, jedna skupina z nich řekla: "Lidé jathribští, není zde pro vás místa, vraťte se!" A druhý oddíl žádal proroka o povolení k návratu řka: "Naše domy jsou obnaženy!", zatímco vůbec nebyly obnaženy, ale oni chtěli jen prchnout.
null.verse 33:14: A kdyby byl nepřítel k nim vnikl z různých konců a byli by bývali vyzváni zřeknout se islámu, věru by na to bývali přistoupili, ale byli by v něm zůstali jen nedlouho.
null.verse 33:15: A předtím již uzavřeli úmluvu s Bohem, že se neobrátí zády; a přece budou na úmluvu svou s Bohem dotázáni!
null.verse 33:16: Rci: "Nic vám neprospěje útěk váš; jestliže utíkáte před smrtí přirozenou či před zabitím, beztak budete užívat světa jen nepatrně.
null.verse 33:17: A řekni jim dále: "Kdo je ten, jenž ochrání vás před Bohem, bude-li On si pro vás přáti zlé anebo bude-li si přáti pro vás milosrdenství?" A nenaleznou vedle Boha ochránce ani pomocníka žádného.
null.verse 33:18: A Bůh zná dobře ty z vás, kdož druhým brání, i ty, kdož říkají bratřím svým: "Pojďte sem k nám!" a přitom ukazují jen malou statečnost
null.verse 33:19: jsouce skoupí vůči vám.
null.verse 33:20: A domnívali se, že spojenci neodejdou; a jestliže spojenci přijdou, tu nejraději by se uchýlili do pouště mezi Araby kočovné a dotazovali se jich na zprávy o vás.
null.verse 33:21: A věru máte nyní v poslu Božím příklad překrásný pro každého, kdo doufá v Boha a v den poslední a kdo Boha hojně vzpomíná.
null.verse 33:22: Když pak věřící spatřili spojence, zvolali: "Tohle je to, co slíbil nám Bůh a posel Jeho a vskutku měli Bůh i posel Jeho pravdu!" A vše to posílilo jen víru a oddanost jejich.
null.verse 33:23: A mezi věřícími jsou muži, kteří věrně dodržují úmluvu, již s Bohem uzavřeli; a jsou mezi nimi někteří, jichž osud již se naplnil, a jiní, kteří ještě čekají a nezměnili se změnou žádnou,
null.verse 33:24: aby Bůh mohl odměnit spravedlivé za upřímnost víry jejich a mohl potrestat pokrytce, bude-li chtít, nebo jim prominout.
null.verse 33:25: A odrazil Bůh nevěřící zlobou naplněné, aniž dosáhli něčeho dobrého.
null.verse 33:26: A vyvedl ty z vlastníků Písma, kteří jim pomáhali, z pevností jejich a uvrhl do srdcí jejich hrůzu, takže jste jednu skupinu z nich zabili a druhou zajali.
null.verse 33:27: A učinil vás dědici jejich země, obydlí, majetků i jedné země, na niž jste dosud nevkročili.
null.verse 33:28: Proroku, rci manželkám svým: "Přejete-li si tento život pozemský a ozdoby jeho, tedy pojďte, nechám vás ho užívat a propustím vás krásným propuštěním.
null.verse 33:29: Však přejete-li si Boha, posla Jeho a příbytek na onom světě, tedy vězte, že Bůh připravil pro ty z vás, jež dobro konají, odměnu nesmírnou.
null.verse 33:30: Ženy prorokovy! Té z vás, jež dopustí se hanebnosti zjevné, té bude trest zdvojnásoben a to je pro Boha velmi snadné.
null.verse 33:31: Avšak té, jež z vás je pokorně oddána Bohu a poslu Jeho a zbožné skutky koná, té dáme odměnu dvojnásobnou a připravíme pro ni přiděl štědrý.
null.verse 33:32: Ženy prorokovy! Nebuďte jako lecjaká jiná žena! Chcete-li být bohabojné, pak nebuďte příliš poddajné v řeči své, aby po vás nebažil ten, v jehož srdci je choroba, nýbrž mluvte slova vhodná!
null.verse 33:33: Zdržujte se důstojně ve svých domech a nestavte na odiv ozdoby svoje podle způsobu dřívější doby nevědomosti! Dodržujte modlitbu, dávejte almužnu a buďte poslušné vůči Bohu a poslu Jeho! Bůh chce pouze odstranit od vás špínu, lidé domu, a chce vás očistit úplným očištěním.
null.verse 33:34: A zapamatujte si to, co bylo přednášeno v domech vašich ze znamení Božích a z moudrosti! A Bůh věru je bystrý, dobře zpravený.
null.verse 33:35: Muslimové a muslimky, věřící muži a věřící ženy, poslušní a poslušné, pravdomluvní a pravdomluvné, trpěliví a trpělivé, pokorní a pokorné, dárci a dárkyně almužny, postící se muži a postící se ženy, cudní a cudné, muži a ženy hojně Boha vzpomínající - těm všem Bůh věru připravil odpuštění i odměnu nesmírnou.
null.verse 33:36: A ani věřícímu, ani věřící není dána volba v záležitostech jejich, jakmile Bůh a posel Jeho věc jednou rozhodli; a kdo neposlouchá Boha a posla Jeho, ten zbloudil zjevným zblouděním.
null.verse 33:37: A hle, pravil jsi tomu, koho Bůh zahrnul dobrodiním a jemuž jsi i ty prokázal dobrodiní: "Podrž si manželku svou a boj se Boha!" A hle, skrýval jsi v duši své to, co Bůh odhalil, a bál ses lidí, zatímco Bůh měl větší právo na to, aby ses bál Jeho.
null.verse 33:38: A není pro proroka žádný hřích v tom, co mu Bůh uložil podle zvyklosti Boží u těch, kdož již předtím odešli a rozkaz Boží je určením předurčeným
null.verse 33:39: pro ty, kdo hlásají poselství Boží a nebojí se nikoho kromě Boha! A Bůh stačí jako účtovatel.
null.verse 33:40: A Muhammad není otcem žádného muže z vás, ale je poslem Božím a pečetí proroků.
null.verse 33:41: Vy, kteří věříte! Vzývejte hojně Boha
null.verse 33:42: a chvalte Jej za jitra i za večera!
null.verse 33:43: On je ten, jenž na vás svolává požehnání stejně jako Jeho andělé, aby vás vyvedl z temnot k světlu - a On slitovný je vůči věřícím.
null.verse 33:44: A bude jejich přivítáním v den, kdy setkají se s Bohem, "Mír s vámi!" a Bůh pro ně připravil odměnu štědrou.
null.verse 33:45: Proroku, vyslali jsme tě jako svědka a hlasatele zvěsti radostné i jako varovatele
null.verse 33:46: vyzývajícího k Bohu, s dovolením Jeho, a jako svítilnu zářící.
null.verse 33:47: A oznam věřícím zvěst radostnou o tom, že mají u Boha přízeň velikou!
null.verse 33:48: Neposlouchej ani nevěřící, ani pokrytce a nevšímej si urážek jejich! Spolehni se na Boha, vždyť Bůh vskutku postačí jako ochránce!
null.verse 33:49: Vy, kteří věříte! Když se oženíte s věřícími ženami a pak se s nimi rozvedete, dříve než jste se jich dotkli, nemusíte jim ukládat čekací dobu, již byste jim počítali.
null.verse 33:50: Proroku! Dovolili jsme ti manželky tvé, jimž jsi dal obvěnění, a ty, jichž zmocnila se tvá pravice z těch, které ti Bůh dal jako kořist, a dále tvé sestřenice z otcovy strany a tvé sestřenice z matčiny strany, které se s tebou vystěhovaly a každou ženu věřící, jestliže se sama darovala prorokovi, chce-li se s ní prorok oženit - a to je výhradně pro tebe, nikoliv pro ostatní věřící.
null.verse 33:51: Odkaž na později tu z nich, kterou chceš, a vezmi k sobě tu, kterou chceš, anebo tu, kterou vyhledáš mezi těmi, které jsi dříve odmítl; a není v tom žádný hřích.
null.verse 33:52: A není ti dovoleno po tomto, aby sis vzal jiné ženy ani abys je vyměňoval za manželky jiné, i kdyby se ti líbila krása jejich, kromě těch, jichž zmocnila se pravice tvá.
null.verse 33:53: Vy, kteří věříte! Nevcházejte do domů prorokových, pokud vám to nebude dovoleno, kvůli jídlu, nečekajíce, až bude připravené! Jste-li však vyzváni, vstupte! A když dojíte, rozejděte se a nepouštějte se do důvěrných hovorů, neboť to se dotýká proroka a on se před vámi stydí! Avšak Bůh se nestydí říci pravdu.
null.verse 33:54: A dáváte-li něco najevo anebo to tajíte, tedy Bůh je věru o každé věci vševědoucí.
null.verse 33:55: A není pro manželky prorokovy hříchem, jsou-li viděny otci svými, syny svými, bratry svými, syny bratří svých a syny sester svých nebo ženami jejich a otrokyněmi svými.
null.verse 33:56: Bůh i andělé Jeho věru svolávají požehnání na proroka; vy, kteří věříte, modlete se také za něj a svolávejte na něj mír!
null.verse 33:57: Věru ty, kdož urážejí Boha a posla Jeho, Bůh prokleje na tomto i onom světě a připraví pro ně trest zahanbující.
null.verse 33:58: A ti, kdož urážejí věřící muže a věřící ženy, aniž si to oni zasloužili, ti se obtížili pomluvou i hříchem zjevným.
null.verse 33:59: Proroku, řekni manželkám svým, dcerám svým i věřícím ženám, aby přitahovaly k sobě své závoje! A toto bude nejvhodnější k tomu, aby byly poznány a nebyly uráženy.
null.verse 33:60: Nepřestanou-li pokrytci a ti, v jejichž srdcích je choroba, a ti, kdož pomluvy šíří v Medíně, věru způsobíme, abys proti nim zakročil a pak již budou jen krátce sousedy tvými.
null.verse 33:61: Prokleti budou, kdekoliv se octnou, a budou zajati a bezohledně zabiti
null.verse 33:62: podle zvyklosti Boží vůči těm, kdož již předtím byli.
null.verse 33:63: A lidé se tě dotazují na Hodinu.
null.verse 33:64: Bůh dozajista proklel nevěřící a připravil pro ně plamen šlehající,
null.verse 33:65: v němž nesmrtelní budou navěky, a nenaleznou ochránce ani pomocníka žádného
null.verse 33:66: v den, kdy tváře jejich se budou v ohni otáčet sem a tam a kdy budou volat: "Kéž bychom byli uposlechli Boha a uposlechli posla!"
null.verse 33:67: A řeknou; "Pane náš, poslouchali jsme náčelníky své a velmože své a oni nám dali zbloudit z cesty!
null.verse 33:68: Pane náš, dej jim trest dvojnásobný a proklej je prokletím velikým!"
null.verse 33:69: Vy, kteří věříte! Nebuďte podobni těm, kdož uráželi Mojžíše! Bůh jej pak zprostil odpovědnosti za to, co hovořili; a byl u Boha ve vážnosti.
null.verse 33:70: Vy, kteří věříte! Bojte se Boha a mluvte slova přímá!
null.verse 33:71: Bůh pak pro vás zlepší skutky vaše a odpustí vám hříchy vaše.
null.verse 33:72: Nabídli jsme břemeno víry nebesům, zemi i horám, ale ony odmítly je nésti a zalekly se ho; a vzal je na sebe člověk, ačkoli je nespravedlivý a nevědomý.
null.verse 33:73: Bůh potrestá pokrytce, muže i ženy, a modloslužebníky a modloslužebnice, ale přijme pokání věřících mužů a věřících žen, vždyť Bůh je odpouštějící, slitovný.

null.verse 33:1: O Profeet, zoek bescherming bij God en gehoorzaam de ongelovigen en de huichelaars niet.
null.verse 33:2: Volg hetgeen u is geopenbaard van uw Heer.
null.verse 33:3: En stel uw vertrouwen in God, want God is als beschermer voldoende.
null.verse 33:4: God heeft voor geen man twee harten in zijn binnenste gemaakt, noch heeft Hij uw vrouwen van wie gij wegblijft door haar moeder te noemen, tot uw moeders gemaakt, noch heeft Hij uw aangenomen zonen tot uw (werkelijke) zonen gemaakt.
null.verse 33:5: Noemt hen bij hun vaders naam dat is billijker in de ogen van God.
null.verse 33:6: De Profeet is dichter bij de gelovigen dan zij zelven, en zijn vrouwen zijn hun moeders.
null.verse 33:7: En toen Wij met de profeten een verbond sloten: met u, met Noach, Abraham, Mozes, en Jezus de zoon van Maria, sloten wij een hecht verbond.
null.verse 33:8: Opdat Hij de waarachtigen over hun waarachtigheid moge ondervragen.
null.verse 33:9: O, gij die gelooft, herinnert u God’s gunst, aan u bewezen, toen er legers tegen u opkwamen en Wij tegen hen een wind zonden en legers die gij niet zaagt.
null.verse 33:10: Toen zij over u kwamen van boven en van beneden, en toen uw ogen staarden en het hart in de keel klopte, en gij over God allerlei gedachten koesterdet.
null.verse 33:11: Toen werden de gelovigen beproefd en zij werden hevig geschokt.
null.verse 33:12: En toen de huichelaars en zij in wier hart een ziekte is, zeiden: "Wat God en Zijn boodschapper ons beloofden was slechts bedrog.
null.verse 33:13: En toen een gedeelte van hen zei: "O volk van Jasrab (Madinah), gij kunt hier geen stand houden, keert daarom terug.
null.verse 33:14: Als men uit de omgeving bij hen zou binnendringen en hun zou worden gevraagd, onlusten te veroorzaken, zouden zij dat terstond hebben gedaan en zij zoudlen slechts weinig hebben getalmd.
null.verse 33:15: Waarlijk, zij hadden reeds vroeger een verbond gesloten dat zij hun rug niet zouden tonen.
null.verse 33:16: Zeg: "Vlucht zal u stellig geen voordeel brengen als gij voor de dood of voor het gevecht vlucht; slechts korte tijd zult gij genieten.
null.verse 33:17: Zeg: "Wie is het, die u tegen God kan beschermen indien Hij u met kwaad wil treffen of barmhartigheid betonen? En zij zullen voor zich buiten God vriend noch helper vinden.
null.verse 33:18: God kent degenen onder u die de mensen tegenhouden, en hen, die tegen hun broeders zeggen: "Komt naar ons toe," en die zich weinig met de oorlog bemoeien.
null.verse 33:19: Zij zijn terughoudend in hun hulp voor u.
null.verse 33:20: Zij denken, dat de bondgenoten niet zijn vertrokken; en als de bondgenoten zouden wederkomen, zouden zij gaarne onder de zwervende Arabieren in de woestijn willen zijn, nieuws over u vragende.
null.verse 33:21: Voorwaar, gij hebt in de Profeet van God een prachtig voorbeeld voor ieder die God en de laatste Dag vreest, en die God vaak herdenkt.
null.verse 33:22: En toen de gelovigen de scharen zagen, zeiden zij: "Dit is wat God en Zijn boodschapper ons beloofden; en God en Zijn boodschapper spraken de waarheid.
null.verse 33:23: Er zijn mensen onder de gelovigen die trouw gebleven zijn aan het verbond dat zij met God hebben gesloten.
null.verse 33:24: Zodat God de waarachtigen voor hun oprechtheid moge belonen en de huichelaars straffen zoals Hij wil, of Zich tot hen in barmhartigheid wenden.
null.verse 33:25: God weerhield de ongelovigen in hun woede; zij verwierven geen voordeel.
null.verse 33:26: En Hij deed de mensen van het Boek die hen (de vijand) hielpen uit hun vestingen komen en vervulde hun hart met ontzetting.
null.verse 33:27: En Hij deed u hun land, huizen en hun rijkdommen erven en ook een land waarop gij nog nooit een voet had gezet.
null.verse 33:28: O profeet! Zeg aan uw vrouwen, "Als gij het leven dezer wereld en zijn luister wenst, komt dan, ik zal u een geschenk geven en u op een grootmoedige manier vrij laten.
null.verse 33:29: Maar indien gij God en Zijn boodschapper en het tehuis van het Hiernamaals wenst, dan heeft God waarlijk voor degenen onder u die goed doen, een grote beloning.
null.verse 33:30: O vrouwen van de profeet! Als iemand onder u schuldig is aan een openbaar onbetamelijk gedrag zal haar straf worden verdubbeld.
null.verse 33:31: Maar wie van u aan God en Zijn boodschapper gehoorzaamt en goede werken doet, haar zullen Wij dubbel belonen en Wij hebben voor haar een waardige voorziening bereid.
null.verse 33:32: O vrouwen van de profeet, gij zijt niet zoals een andere vrouw.
null.verse 33:33: Blijft in uw huizen en stelt uw schoonheid niet ten toon als in de vroegere dagen der onwetendheid; leeft het gebed na, en betaalt de Zakaat en gehoorzaamt God en Zijn boodschapper.
null.verse 33:34: En herinnert u de woorden van God en de wijsheid die in uw huizen wordt verkondigd; want God is Aldoordringend, Alkennend.
null.verse 33:35: Voorwaar, de Moslims en de Moslima’s en de gelovige mannen en vrouwen, de gehoorzame mannen en vrouwen, de waarachtige mannen en vrouwen, de standvastige mannen en vrouwen, de mannen en de vrouwen die nederig zijn, de mannen en de vrouwen die aalmoezen geven, de mannen en de vrouwen die vasten, de mannen en de vrouwen die hun kuisheid bewaren, de mannen en de vrouwen die God vaak gedenken - voor zulken heeft God vergiffenis en een grote beloning bereid.
null.verse 33:36: En het betaamt de gelovige man of vrouw niet, wanneer God en Zijn boodschapper over een zaak hebben beslist, dat er voor hen een keuze zou zijn in die zaak.
null.verse 33:37: En herinnert u, toen gij tot hem, wie God gunsten had bewezen en wie gij ook gunsten had bewezen, zeidet: "Behoud uw vrouw voor u en vrees God.
null.verse 33:38: Er moet voor de profeet geen bezwaar zijn betreffende hetgeen God voor hem geordend heeft.
null.verse 33:39: Degenen, die God’s boodschappen brengen, vrezen Hem en buiten God niemand.
null.verse 33:40: Mohammed is niet de vader van één uwer mannen, maar de boodschapper van God en het zegel der profeten; God heeft kennis van alle dingen.
null.verse 33:41: O, gij die gelooft! Gedenkt God veelvuldig.
null.verse 33:42: En prijst Zijn Heiligheid ’s morgens en ’s avonds.
null.verse 33:43: Hij is het Die u zegent en ook Zijn engelen doen dit, opdat Hij u van de duisternissen tot het licht moge leiden.
null.verse 33:44: De Dag waarop zij Hem zullen ontmoeten zal hun groet "Vrede" zijn.
null.verse 33:45: O, profeet.
null.verse 33:46: En als een roeper tot God door Zijn gebod, en als een stralende zon.
null.verse 33:47: Verkondig derhalve aan de gelovigen het blijde nieuws dat zij van God grote genade zullen ontvangen.
null.verse 33:48: En gehoorzaam de ongelovigen en de huichelaars niet en sla geen acht op hun grievende taal, stel uw vertrouwen in God, want God is Toereikend als Beschermer.
null.verse 33:49: O, gij die gelooft! Als gij een gelovige vrouw huwt en daarna van haar scheidt voordat gij haar hebt aangeraakt dan behoeft zij om uwentwille geen wachtperiode te berekenen.
null.verse 33:50: profeet, Wij hebben voor u uw vrouwen wettig gemaakt, aan wie gij haar huwelijksgiften hebt gegeven, en degenen die uw rechterhand bezit van haar, die God u als een oorlogsbuit heeft gegeven en de dochters van uw ooms en tantes van vaderszijde en de dochters van uw ooms en tantes van moederszijde die met u emigreerden, en elke gelovige vrouw indien zij zich aan de profeet toevertrouwt als de profeet haar wenst te huwen; dit is slechts voor u en niet voor de gelovigen.
null.verse 33:51: Gij moogt verlaten wie gij wilt en tot u nemen wie gij wilt, er rust geen blaam op u wanneer gij haar terugneemt van wie gij u afzijdig hebt gehouden.
null.verse 33:52: Het is u hierna niet toegestaan vrouwen te huwen noch haar voor andere vrouwen te ruilen, zelfs al behaagt u haar schoonheid, met uitzondering van haar die uw rechterhand mocht bezitten.
null.verse 33:53: O, gij die gelooft! Gaat de huizen van de profeet niet binnen tenzij gij uitgenodigd wordt tot een maaltijd, doch niet wachtend tot deze gereed is.
null.verse 33:54: Of gij iets openbaar maakt of verbergt, waarlijk God heeft kennis van alle dingen.
null.verse 33:55: Er rust op haar (uw vrouwen) geen schuld als zij zich tonen aan haar vaders of haar zonen of haar broeders of de zonen van haar broeders, of de zonen van haar zusters en hun vrouwen of hun ondergeschikten.
null.verse 33:56: God en Zijn engelen zenden zegeningen over de profeet.
null.verse 33:57: Betreffende hen, die God en Zijn boodschapper lastig vallen, God heeft hen in deze wereld en in het Hiernamaals vervloekt en heeft een vernederende straf voor hen bereid.
null.verse 33:58: En zij, die gelovige mannen en vrouwen lastig vallen zonder dat dezen er schuld aan hebben, dragen voorzeker de schuld van laster en een openlijke zonde.
null.verse 33:59: O profeet! Zeg aan uw vrouwen en uw dochters en de vrouwen der gelovigen dat zij een gedeelte van haar omslagdoeken over haar (hoofd) laten hangen.
null.verse 33:60: Indien de huichelaars en degenen in wier hart een ziekte is en degenen die opschudding in de stad veroorzaken, niet ophouden, zullen Wij u zeker tegen hen in beweging brengen; dan zullen zij slechts voor een korte tijd in uw nabijheid mogen vertoeven.
null.verse 33:61: Vervloekt zijn zij; waar zij zich ook bevinden zullen zij worden gegrepen en gedood.
null.verse 33:62: Voorwaar, zo was God’s handelwijze met degenen die voordien zijn heengegaan en in God’s handelwijze zult gij geen verandering vinden.
null.verse 33:63: De mensen vragen u over het Uur.
null.verse 33:64: God heeft de ongelovigen zeker vervloekt en heeft een laaiend Vuur voor hen bereid.
null.verse 33:65: Daarin zullen zij voor lange tijd vertoeven en zullen vriend noch helper vinden.
null.verse 33:66: De Dag waarop hun gezicht zich in het Vuur zal wentelen zullen zij zeggen: "O, hadden wij slechts God en Zijn boodschapper gehoorzaamd!"
null.verse 33:67: En zij zullen zeggen: "Onze Heer, wij gehoorzaamden onze leiders en onze grote mannen maar zij deden ons van de rechte weg afdwalen.
null.verse 33:68: Onze Heer, geef hun een dubbele straf en vloek hen met een zware vloek.
null.verse 33:69: , gij die gelooft! weest niet zoals degenen die Mozes ergerden! God echter zuiverde hem van hetgeen zij zeiden.
null.verse 33:70: O, gij die gelooft! Vreest God en spreekt de waarheid.
null.verse 33:71: Hij zal uw werken goed voor u maken en u uw zonden vergeven.
null.verse 33:72: Voorwaar, Wij boden de hemelen, de aarde en de bergen aan, hun (iets) toe te vertrouwen, maar zij weigerden dit te dragen en vreesden er voor, maar de mens nam het op zich.
null.verse 33:73: Het gevolg er van is dat God huichelachtige mannen en vrouwen, en afgodendienaren en afgodendienaressen zal straffen.

Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:1: O Prophet! Keep thy duty to Allah and obey not the disbelievers and the hypocrites.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:2: And follow that which is inspired in thee from thy Lord.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:3: And put thy trust in Allah, for Allah is sufficient as Trustee.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:4: Allah hath not assigned unto any man two hearts within his body, nor hath He made your wives whom ye declare (to be your mothers) your mothers, nor hath He made those whom ye claim (to be your sons) your sons.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:6: The Prophet is closer to the believers than their selves, and his wives are (as) their mothers.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:7: And when We exacted a covenant from the prophets, and from thee (O Muhammad) and from Noah and Abraham and Moses and Jesus son of Mary.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:8: That He may ask the loyal of their loyalty.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:9: O ye who believe! Remember Allah’s favour unto you when there came against you hosts, and We sent against them a great wind and hosts ye could not see.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:10: When they came upon you from above you and from below you, and when eyes grew wild and hearts reached to the throats, and ye were imagining vain thoughts concerning Allah.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:11: There were the believers sorely tried, and shaken with a mighty shock.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:12: And when the hypocrites, and those in whose hearts is a disease, were saying: Allah and His messenger promised us naught but delusion.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:13: And when a party of them said: O folk of Yathrib! There is no stand (possible) for you, therefor turn back.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:14: If the enemy had entered from all sides and they had been exhorted to treachery, they would have committed it, and would have hesitated thereupon but little.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:15: And verily they had already sworn unto Allah that they would not turn their backs (to the foe).
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:16: Say: Flight will not avail you if ye flee from death or killing, and then ye dwell in comfort but a little while.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:17: Say: Who is he who can preserve you from Allah if He intendeth harm for you, or intendeth mercy for you.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:18: Allah already knoweth those of you who hinder, and those who say unto their brethren: "Come ye hither unto us!" and they come not to the stress of battle save a little,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:19: Being sparing of their help to you (believers).
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:20: They hold that the clans have not retired (for good); and if the clans should advance (again), they would fain be in the desert with the wandering Arabs, asking for the news of you; and if they were among you, they would not give battle, save a little.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:21: Verily in the messenger of Allah ye have a good example for him who looketh unto Allah and the Last Day, and remembereth Allah much.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:22: And when the true believers saw the clans, they said: This is that which Allah and His messenger promised us.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:23: Of the believers are men who are true to that which they covenanted with Allah.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:24: That Allah may reward the true men for their truth, and punish the hypocrites if He will, or relent toward them (if He will).
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:25: And Allah repulsed the disbelievers in their wrath; they gained no good.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:26: And He brought those of the People of the Scripture who supported them down from their strongholds, and cast panic into their hearts.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:27: And He caused you to inherit their land and their houses and their wealth, and land ye have not trodden.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:28: O Prophet! Say unto thy wives: If ye desire the world’s life and its adornment, come! I will content you and will release you with a fair release.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:29: But if ye desire Allah and His messenger and the abode of the Hereafter, then lo! Allah hath prepared for the good among you an immense reward.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:30: O ye wives of the Prophet! Whosoever of you committeth manifest lewdness, the punishment for her will be doubled, and that is easy for Allah.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:31: And whosoever of you is submissive unto Allah and His messenger and doeth right, We shall give her her reward twice over, and We have prepared for her a rich provision.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:32: O ye wives of the Prophet! Ye are not like any other women.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:34: And bear in mind that which is recited in your houses of the revelations of Allah and wisdom.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:35: Lo! men who surrender unto Allah, and women who surrender, and men who believe and women who believe, and men who obey and women who obey, and men who speak the truth and women who speak the truth, and men who persevere (in righteousness) and women who persevere, and men who are humble and women who are humble, and men who give alms and women who give alms, and men who fast and women who fast, and men who guard their modesty and women who guard (their modesty), and men who remember Allah much and women who remember - Allah hath prepared for them forgiveness and a vast reward.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:36: And it becometh not a believing man or a believing woman, when Allah and His messenger have decided an affair (for them), that they should (after that) claim any say in their affair; and whoso is rebellious to Allah and His messenger, he verily goeth astray in error manifest.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:37: And when thou saidst unto him on whom Allah hath conferred favour and thou hast conferred favour: Keep thy wife to thyself, and fear Allah.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:38: There is no reproach for the Prophet in that which Allah maketh his due.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:39: Who delivered the messages of Allah and feared Him, and feared none save Allah.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:40: Muhammad is not the father of any man among you, but he is the messenger of Allah and the Seal of the Prophets; and Allah is ever Aware of all things.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:41: O ye who believe! Remember Allah with much remembrance.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:42: And glorify Him early and late.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:43: He it is Who blesseth you, and His angels (bless you), that He may bring you forth from darkness unto light; and He is ever Merciful to the believers.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:44: Their salutation on the day when they shall meet Him will be: Peace.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:45: O Prophet! Lo! We have sent thee as a witness and a bringer of good tidings and a warner.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:46: And as a summoner unto Allah by His permission, and as a lamp that giveth light.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:47: And announce unto the believers the good tidings that they will have great bounty from Allah.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:48: And incline not to the disbelievers and the hypocrites.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:49: O ye who believe! If ye wed believing women and divorce them before ye have touched them, then there is no period that ye should reckon.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:50: O Prophet! Lo! We have made lawful unto thee thy wives unto whom thou hast paid their dowries, and those whom thy right hand possesseth of those whom Allah hath given thee as spoils of war, and the daughters of thine uncle on the father’s side and the daughters of thine aunts on the father’s side, and the daughters of thine uncle on the mother’s side and the daughters of thine aunts on the mother’s side who emigrated with thee, and a believing woman if she give herself unto the Prophet and the Prophet desire to ask her in marriage - a privilege for thee only, not for the (rest of) believers - We are Aware of that which We enjoined upon them concerning their wives and those whom their right hands possess - that thou mayst be free from blame, for Allah is ever Forgiving, Merciful.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:51: Thou canst defer whom thou wilt of them and receive unto thee whom thou wilt, and whomsoever thou desirest of those whom thou hast set aside (temporarily), it is no sin for thee (to receive her again); that is better; that they may be comforted and not grieve, and may all be pleased with what thou givest them.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:52: It is not allowed thee to take (other) women henceforth, nor that thou shouldst change them for other wives even though their beauty pleased thee, save those whom thy right hand possesseth.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:53: O Ye who believe! Enter not the dwellings of the Prophet for a meal without waiting for the proper time, unless permission be granted you.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:54: Whether ye divulge a thing or keep it hidden, lo! Allah is ever Knower of all things.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:55: It is no sin for them (thy wives) to converse freely) with their fathers, or their sons, or their brothers, or their brothers’ sons, or the sons of their sisters or of their own women, or their slaves.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:56: Lo! Allah and His angels shower blessings on the Prophet.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:57: Lo! those who malign Allah and His messenger, Allah hath cursed them in the world and the Hereafter, and hath prepared for them the doom of the disdained.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:58: And those who malign believing men and believing women undeservedly, they bear the guilt of slander and manifest sin.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:59: O Prophet! Tell thy wives and thy daughters and the women of the believers to draw their cloaks close round them (when they go abroad).
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:60: If the hypocrites, and those in whose hearts is a disease, and the alarmists in the city do not cease, We verily shall urge thee on against them, then they will be your neighbours in it but a little while.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:61: Accursed, they will be seized wherever found and slain with a (fierce) slaughter.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:62: That was the way of Allah in the case of those who passed away of old; thou wilt not find for the way of Allah aught of power to change.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:63: Men ask thee of the Hour.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:64: Lo! Allah hath cursed the disbelievers, and hath prepared for them a flaming fire,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:65: Wherein they will abide for ever.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:66: On the day when their faces are turned over in the Fire, they say: Oh, would that we had obeyed Allah and had obeyed His messenger!
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:67: And they say: Our Lord! Lo! we obeyed our princes and great men, and they misled us from the Way.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:68: Our Lord! Oh, give them double torment and curse them with a mighty curse.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:69: O ye who believe! Be not as those who slandered Moses, but Allah proved his innocence of that which they alleged, and he was well esteemed in Allah’s sight.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:70: O ye who believe! Guard your duty to Allah, and speak words straight to the point;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:71: He will adjust your works for you and will forgive you your sins.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:72: Lo! We offered the trust unto the heavens and the earth and the hills, but they shrank from bearing it and were afraid of it.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 33:73: So Allah punisheth hypocritical men and hypocritical women, and idolatrous men and idolatrous women.

Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:1: O Prophet! Fear God, and hearken not to the Unbelievers and the Hypocrites: verily God is full of Knowledge and Wisdom.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:2: But follow that which comes to thee by inspiration from thy Lord: for God is well acquainted with (all) that ye do.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:3: And put thy trust in God, and enough is God as a disposer of affairs.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:4: God has not made for any man two hearts in his (one) body: nor has He made your wives whom ye divorce by Zihar your mothers: nor has He made your adopted sons your sons.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:5: Call them by (the names of) their fathers: that is juster in the sight of God.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:6: The Prophet is closer to the Believers than their own selves, and his wives are their mothers.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:7: And remember We took from the prophets their covenant: As (We did) from thee: from Noah, Abraham, Moses, and Jesus the son of Mary: We took from them a solemn covenant:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:8: That (God) may question the (custodians) of Truth concerning the Truth they (were charged with): And He has prepared for the Unbelievers a grievous Penalty.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:9: O ye who believe! Remember the Grace of God, (bestowed) on you, when there came down on you hosts (to overwhelm you): But We sent against them a hurricane and forces that ye saw not: but God sees (clearly) all that ye do.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:10: Behold! they came on you from above you and from below you, and behold, the eyes became dim and the hearts gaped up to the throats, and ye imagined various (vain) thoughts about God!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:11: In that situation were the Believers tried: they were shaken as by a tremendous shaking.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:12: And behold! The Hypocrites and those in whose hearts is a disease (even) say: "God and His Apostle promised us nothing but delusion!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:13: Behold! A party among them said: "Ye men of Yathrib! ye cannot stand (the attack)! therefore go back!" And a band of them ask for leave of the Prophet, saying, "Truly our houses are bare and exposed," though they were not exposed they intended nothing but to run away.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:14: And if an entry had been effected to them from the sides of the (city), and they had been incited to sedition, they would certainly have brought it to pass, with none but a brief delay!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:15: And yet they had already covenanted with God not to turn their backs, and a covenant with God must (surely) be answered for.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:16: Say: "Running away will not profit you if ye are running away from death or slaughter; and even if (ye do escape), no more than a brief (respite) will ye be allowed to enjoy!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:17: Say: "Who is it that can screen you from God if it be His wish to give you punishment or to give you Mercy?" Nor will they find for themselves, besides God, any protector or helper.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:18: Verily God knows those among you who keep back (men) and those who say to their brethren, "Come along to us", but come not to the fight except for just a little while.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:20: They think that the Confederates have not withdrawn; and if the Confederates should come (again), they would wish they were in the deserts (wandering) among the Bedouins, and seeking news about you (from a safe distance); and if they were in your midst, they would fight but little.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:21: Ye have indeed in the Apostle of God a beautiful pattern (of conduct) for any one whose hope is in God and the Final Day, and who engages much in the Praise of God.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:22: When the Believers saw the Confederate forces, they said: "This is what God and his Apostle had promised us, and God and His Apostle told us what was true.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:23: Among the Believers are men who have been true to their covenant with God: of them some have completed their vow (to the extreme), and some (still) wait: but they have never changed (their determination) in the least:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:24: That God may reward the men of Truth for their Truth, and punish the Hypocrites if that be His Will, or turn to them in Mercy: for God is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:25: And God turned back the Unbelievers for (all) their fury: no advantage did they gain; and enough is God for the believers in their fight.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:26: And those of the People of the Book who aided them - God did take them down from their strongholds and cast terror into their hearts.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:27: And He made you heirs of their lands, their houses, and their goods, and of a land which ye had not frequented (before).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:28: O Prophet! Say to thy Consorts: "If it be that ye desire the life of this World, and its glitter,- then come! I will provide for your enjoyment and set you free in a handsome manner.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:29: But if ye seek God and His Apostle, and the Home of the Hereafter, verily God has prepared for the well-doers amongst you a great reward.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:30: O Consorts of the Prophet! If any of you were guilty of evident unseemly conduct, the Punishment would be doubled to her, and that is easy for God.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:31: But any of you that is devout in the service of God and His Apostle, and works righteousness,- to her shall We grant her reward twice: and We have prepared for her a generous Sustenance.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:32: O Consorts of the Prophet! Ye are not like any of the (other) women: if ye do fear (God), be not too complacent of speech, lest one in whose heart is a disease should be moved with desire: but speak ye a speech (that is) just.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:33: And stay quietly in your houses, and make not a dazzling display, like that of the former Times of Ignorance; and establish regular Prayer, and give regular Charity; and obey God and His Apostle.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:34: And recite what is rehearsed to you in your homes, of the Signs of God and His Wisdom: for God understands the finest mysteries and is well-acquainted (with them).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:35: For Muslim men and women,- for believing men and women, for devout men and women, for true men and women, for men and women who are patient and constant, for men and women who humble themselves, for men and women who give in Charity, for men and women who fast (and deny themselves), for men and women who guard their chastity, and for men and women who engage much in God’s praise,- for them has God prepared forgiveness and great reward.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:36: It is not fitting for a Believer, man or woman, when a matter has been decided by God and His Apostle to have any option about their decision: if any one disobeys God and His Apostle, he is indeed on a clearly wrong Path.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:37: Behold! Thou didst say to one who had received the grace of God and thy favour: "Retain thou (in wedlock) thy wife, and fear God.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:38: There can be no difficulty to the Prophet in what God has indicated to him as a duty.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:39: (It is the practice of those) who preach the Messages of God, and fear Him, and fear none but God.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:40: Muhammad is not the father of any of your men, but (he is) the Apostle of God, and the Seal of the Prophets: and God has full knowledge of all things.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:41: O ye who believe! Celebrate the praises of God, and do this often;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:42: And glorify Him morning and evening.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:43: He it is Who sends blessings on you, as do His angels, that He may bring you out from the depths of Darkness into Light: and He is Full of Mercy to the Believers.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:44: Their salutation on the Day they meet Him will be "Peace!"; and He has prepared for them a generous Reward.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:45: O Prophet! Truly We have sent thee as a Witness, a Bearer of Glad Tidings, and Warner,-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:46: And as one who invites to God’s (grace) by His leave, and as a lamp spreading light.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:47: Then give the Glad Tidings to the Believers, that they shall have from God a very great Bounty.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:48: And obey not (the behests) of the Unbelievers and the Hypocrites, and heed not their annoyances, but put thy Trust in God.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:49: O ye who believe! When ye marry believing women, and then divorce them before ye have touched them, no period of ’Iddat have ye to count in respect of them: so give them a present.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:50: O Prophet! We have made lawful to thee thy wives to whom thou hast paid their dowers; and those whom thy right hand possesses out of the prisoners of war whom God has assigned to thee; and daughters of thy paternal uncles and aunts, and daughters of thy maternal uncles and aunts, who migrated (from Makka) with thee; and any believing woman who dedicates her soul to the Prophet if the Prophet wishes to wed her;- this only for thee, and not for the Believers (at large); We know what We have appointed for them as to their wives and the captives whom their right hands possess;- in order that there should be no difficulty for thee.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:51: Thou mayest defer (the turn of) any of them that thou pleasest, and thou mayest receive any thou pleasest: and there is no blame on thee if thou invite one whose (turn) thou hadst set aside.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:52: It is not lawful for thee (to marry more) women after this, nor to change them for (other) wives, even though their beauty attract thee, except any thy right hand should possess (as handmaidens): and God doth watch over all things.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:53: O ye who believe! Enter not the Prophet’s houses,- until leave is given you,- for a meal, (and then) not (so early as) to wait for its preparation: but when ye are invited, enter; and when ye have taken your meal, disperse, without seeking familiar talk.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:54: Whether ye reveal anything or conceal it, verily God has full knowledge of all things.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:55: There is no blame (on these ladies if they appear) before their fathers or their sons, their brothers, or their brother’s sons, or their sisters’ sons, or their women, or the (slaves) whom their right hands possess.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:56: God and His angels send blessings on the Prophet: O ye that believe! Send ye blessings on him, and salute him with all respect.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:57: Those who annoy God and His Apostle - God has cursed them in this World and in the Hereafter, and has prepared for them a humiliating Punishment.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:58: And those who annoy believing men and women undeservedly, bear (on themselves) a calumny and a glaring sin.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:59: O Prophet! Tell thy wives and daughters, and the believing women, that they should cast their outer garments over their persons (when abroad): that is most convenient, that they should be known (as such) and not molested.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:60: Truly, if the Hypocrites, and those in whose hearts is a disease, and those who stir up sedition in the City, desist not, We shall certainly stir thee up against them: Then will they not be able to stay in it as thy neighbours for any length of time:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:61: They shall have a curse on them: whenever they are found, they shall be seized and slain (without mercy).
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:62: (Such was) the practice (approved) of God among those who lived aforetime: No change wilt thou find in the practice (approved) of God.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:63: Men ask thee concerning the Hour: Say, "The knowledge thereof is with God (alone)": and what will make thee understand?- perchance the Hour is nigh!
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:64: Verily God has cursed the Unbelievers and prepared for them a Blazing Fire,-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:65: To dwell therein for ever: no protector will they find, nor helper.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:66: The Day that their faces will be turned upside down in the Fire, they will say: "Woe to us! Would that we had obeyed God and obeyed the Apostle!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:67: And they would say: "Our Lord! We obeyed our chiefs and our great ones, and they misled us as to the (right) Path.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:68: "Our Lord! Give them double Penalty and curse them with a very great Curse!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:69: O ye who believe! Be ye not like those who vexed and insulted Moses, but God cleared him of the (calumnies) they had uttered: and he was honourable in God’s sight.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:70: O ye who believe! Fear God, and (always) say a word directed to the Right:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:71: That He may make your conduct whole and sound and forgive you your sins: He that obeys God and His Apostle, has already attained the highest achievement.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:72: We did indeed offer the Trust to the Heavens and the Earth and the Mountains; but they refused to undertake it, being afraid thereof: but man undertook it;- He was indeed unjust and foolish;-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 33:73: (With the result) that God has to punish the Hypocrites, men and women, and the Unbelievers, men and women, and God turns in Mercy to the Believers, men and women: for God is Oft-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:1: O Prophet, fear God, and obey not the unbelievers and the hypocrites.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:2: And follow what is revealed to thee from thy Lord; surely God is aware of the things you do.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:3: And put thy trust in God; God suffices as a guardian.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:4: God has not assigned to any man two hearts within his breast; nor has He made your wives, when you divorce, saying, ’Be as my mother’s back,’ truly your mothers, neither has He made your adopted sons your sons in fact.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:5: Call them after their true fathers; that is more equitable in the sight of God.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:6: The Prophet is nearer to the believers than their selves; his wives are their mothers.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:7: And when We took compact from the Prophets, and from thee, and from Noah, and Abraham, Moses, and Jesus, Mary’s son; We took from them a solemn compact,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:8: that He might question the truthful concerning their truthfulness; and He has prepared for the unbelievers a painful chastisement.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:9: O believers, remember God’s blessing upon you when hosts came against you, and We loosed against them a wind, and hosts you saw not; and God sees the things you do.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:10: When they came against you from above you and from below you, and when your eyes swerved and your hearts reached your throats, while you thought thoughts about God;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:11: there it was that the believers were tried, and shaken most mightily.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:12: And when tile hypocrites, and those in whose hearts is sickness, said, ’God and His Messenger promised us only delusion.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:13: And when a party of them said, ’O people of Yathrib, there is no abiding here for you, therefore return!’ And a part of them Were asking leave of the Prophet, saying, ’Our houses are exposed’; yet they were not exposed; they desired only to flee.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:14: And if entrance had been forced against them from those quarters, and then they had been asked to apostatise, they would have done so, and but tarried about it briefly.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:15: Yet they had made covenant with God before that, that they would not turn their backs; and covenants with God shall be questioned of
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:16: Say: ’Flight will not profit you, if you flee from death or slaying; you will be given enjoyment of days then but little.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:17: Say: ’Who is he that shall defend you from God, if lie desires evil for you, or desires mercy for you?’ They shall find for themselves, apart from God, neither protector nor helper.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:18: God would surely know those of you who hinder, and those who say to their brothers, ’Come to us,’ and come to battle but little,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:20: They think the Confederates have not departed; and if the Confederates come, they will wish that they were desert-dwellers among the Bedoums asking for news of you.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:21: You have had a good example in God’s Messenger for whosoever hopes for God and the Last Day, and remembers God oft.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:22: When the believers saw the Confederates they said, ’This is what God and His Messenger promised us, and God and His Messenger have spoken truly.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:23: Among the believers are men who were true to their covenant with God; some of them have fulfilled their vow by death, and some are still awaiting, and they have not changed in the least;
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:24: that God may recompense the truthful ones for their truthfulness, and chastise the hypocrites, if He will, or turn again unto them.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:25: And God sent back those that were unbelievers in their rage, and they attained no good; God spared the believers of fighting.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:26: And He brought down those of the People of the Book who supported them from their fortresses and cast terror in their hearts; some you slew, some you made captive.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:27: And He bequeathed upon you their lands, their habitations, and their possessions, and a land you never trod.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:28: O Prophet, say to thy wives: ’If you desire the present life and its adornment, come now, I will make you provision, and set you free with kindliness.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:29: But if you desire God and His Messenger and the Last Abode, surely God has prepared for those amongst you such as do good a mighty wage.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:30: Wives of the Prophet, whosoever among you commits a flagrant indecency, for her the chastisement shall be doubled; that is easy for God.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:31: But whosoever of you is obedient to God and His Messenger, and does righteousness, We shall pay her her wage twice over; We have prepared for her a generous provision.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:32: Wives of the Prophet, you are not as other women.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:33: Remain in your houses; and display not your finery, as did the pagans of old.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:34: And remember that which is recited in your houses of the signs of God and the Wisdom; God is All-subtle, All-aware.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:35: Men and women who have surrendered, believing men and believing women, obedient men and obedient women, truthful men and truthful women, enduring men and enduring women, humble men and humble women, men and women who give in charity, men who fast and women who fast, men and women who guard their private parts, men and women who remember God oft -- for them God has prepared forgiveness and a mighty wage.

Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:45: O Prophet, We have sent thee as a witness, and good tidings to bear and warning,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:46: calling unto God by His leave, and as a light-giving lamp.

Arberry.verse 33:50: O Prophet, We have made lawful for thee thy wives whom thou hast given their wages and what thy right hand owns, spoils of war that God has given thee, and the daughters of thy uncles paternal and aunts paternal, thy uncles maternal and aunts maternal, who have emigrated with thee, and any woman believer, if she give herself to the Prophet and if the Prophet desire to take her in marriage, for thee exclusively, apart from the believers -- We know what We have imposed upon them touching their wives and what their right hands own -- that there may be no fault in thee; God is All-forgiving, All-compassionate.

Arthur J. Arberry.verse 33:56: God and His angels bless the Prophet.
